course_title: Special Topics: Film and Media: Journalism in the Movies
class_notes:
(Same as ENGCW 389 1)
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)
(Application required. Complete course atlas information (including texts and grading) and application form will be available on the Creative Writing Program website in MID-OCTOBER: https://creativewriting.emory.edu/index.html)
Both accepted and waitlisted students are required to attend the first class.
Pre-requisite: none
Writing sample required: 2 non-scientific papers that exhibit deep research (10-20 pages total)
course_description: Rotating topics in film and media. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: FILM 102 and (FILM 201 or FILM 202 or FILM 203 or FILM 204 or FILM_OX 204 or FILM 205) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: 4582, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: H. Klibanoff, Status: Open
